p: Essential oil yield, anthelmintic and IC50 values were determined in triplicates. Results were expressed as means ± standard deviation (SD). Data were analyzed using ANOVA with multiple comparisons. The statistical significance was determined when the p value was <0.05. Statistical significance was expressed using * with p value <0.05, ** with p value ≤ 0.001, and *** with p value ≤ 0.0001.
